import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) //prende le informazioni dell'utente dallo store const { userInfo } = userLogin const dispatch = useDispatch() const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } return (
Proshop Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : ( Login )} {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && ( Users Logout )}
) } export default Header
